summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with community post methods, and a TanStack Router-based frontend with layout/navigation, age gate, themed styling (warm palette + background pattern), seeded articles/events, gallery grid, community board with Internet Identity sign-in controls, and contact mailto/copy-to-clipboard UI. Some requirements cannot be fully verified due to truncated/omitted files, and a few explicit requirements appear unimplemented or unverifiable from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend support for the Community Board must be for authenticated users (enforce authentication for createPost).
missing_requirements.reason: The backend createPost method accepts any caller and does not check/deny anonymous principals; authentication is only enforced in the frontend UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Articles/Guides contains at least 6 items with titles, short summaries, and full detail text.
missing_requirements.reason: The articles content file is truncated in the diff summary and only shows a few entries; at least 6 items cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend code references the required generated image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files added under frontend/public/assets/generated (omitted files are not enumerated).

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an external promotional link to caffeine.ai (“Built with … caffeine.ai”).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and introduces unrelated branding/external link.
